title: Can't use a skin upgraded  via Hextech Crafting?
body:
I recently upgraded a firefighter skin of Tristana via Hextech Crafting,but i cannot use it in my game.I mean I see nowhere to switch it.It even does not exist in the skin store.

Please fix this!

Thank you!

replies.body: I tried to look into this for you, but I'm not sure you are posting from the affected account.  Let me know and I'd be happy to check for you!

I'm assuming you own Tristana already (though if not, you can get her free). Firefighter Tristana is a Legacy skin and does not show up in the store, but if you own it it should show up on her champion page in your profile. You select skins in Champion Select after you've chosen and locked in your champion.

Could you give me more details about where you are not seeing it where you think you should? Also, when you "upgraded" the skin through Hextech Crafting, do you mean you rerolled 3 skins to craft it, you spent Orange Essence to craft it from the shard, or did you simply receive the shard by opening a Hextech Chest?

Let me know details so we can figure this out. Pictures may help (you must upload the picture to a third party site, then link the image URL).

I do have Tristana and I spent Orange Essence to crat it from the shard.
I cannot see it in the store or on her champion page in my profile.I mean I can barely see four skins in her profile in addition to the original one.
Literally,I was robbed by firefighter Tristana and she does not show up again.TAT

Have you tried reloading your client? FF Trist and several other of her skins are Legacy so will not show up in the store, and if the client is having trouble getting information from the server for your account it will only load into your profile the ones that are available in the store (it may even say she is unavailable even though you own her).

I have reloaded my client for many times but not a clue.I understand I could not see it in the store,but why can`t I check it out on her champion profile.The truth is my orange essence is gone so I am sure I should own FF.
Can u help me out of this situation?Maybe try to coorect the information sent to my account?

One of the Rioters on this board will probably be going through these threads in the morning. I'll ask them to take a look, and if they can't help they'll ask you to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). It'll suck that you don't have access to it right now but it'll get sorted out, so please be patient.

Make sure you look in your Purchase History too, and grab a screenshot of it.
actually,it is fine now.I have get the problem fixed.Thx
Do you know what the problem was?
